title: A Neuroscientist Weighs In: Why Do We Disagree On The Color Of The Dress?
teaser: Robert Siegel speaks with Dr. Bevil Conway, a neuroscientist at Wellesley College, about the dress that has the whole Internet asking: What color is it?
contentencoded:
Robert Siegel speaks with Dr. Bevil Conway, a neuroscientist at Wellesley College, about the dress that has the whole Internet asking: What color is it?
